Row.Text: The Age of Exploration will soon come to an end

The Exploration Age is drawing to a close. From this point forward, the Age only progresses when you select Next Turn; no other effects will influence its advance. Reflect on the remaining opportunities, and ready your Civilization for the dawn of a new era.

The Exploration Age is drawing to a close. From this point forward, the Age only progresses when you select Next Turn; no other effects will influence its advance. If no Victory is won before the end of the Age, the player who accumulated the most [B]Legacy Points[/B] over the course of the Age will be the winner. Reflect on the remaining opportunities and etch your Civilization's legacy into history.
